# isStudioLightSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports Studio Light.

## Declaration

```swift
var isStudioLightSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isStudioLightEnabled] for more information on the Studio Light feature.

## Determining Studio Light support

- **videoFrameRateRangeForStudioLight**: A value that indicates the minimum and maximum frame rates available when a user enables Studio Light.

items.description: A value that indicates the minimum and maximum frame rates available when a user enables Studio Light.
